title: Beaditive Magnetic Pin Cushion with Drawer - Strong Magnet Pin Holder Cushions for Sewing - 50 Glass Head Quilting Pins Included - Chic Pincushion Caddy for Sewing Pins, Paper Clips (Fuchsia)
features: ðŸ§· Make Your Sewing Projects Easier: Our magnetic pin holder will store your sewing pins and needles in the right place, to keep them at hand, prevent their loss and save you time looking for them everywhere.

ðŸ§· Organize Your Sewing Supplies: This magnetic holder has a convenient plastic drawer in the front, which will hold together all your sewing pins for fabric and keep them securely stored on your sewing table.

ðŸ§· Get A Mega-Value Magnetic Box: Our bundle offers you more than other magnetic pin cushions, including in your order 50 easy to hold, eye-catching glass head quilting pins, for pinning the fabric more easily.

ðŸ§· Get A Multipurpose Magnetic Tool Case: This versatile pin holder is not only great for storing your sewing supplies and accessories but can also be used for organizing your paper clips, nails, screws, or other metal objects.

ðŸ§· Pick Up Dropped Pins Easily: If you end up having pins all over your work table or the ground, just turn the magnetic pin bowl upside down, hold it there, and it will grab all pins and needles in no time.
description: Product Description Hassle-Free Pin Storage and Access with Strong Magnet With our strong magnet, It's a simple and effective way to store and access your pins without any hassle. Organized Sewing Pin Storage Mess-free and accessible sewing pin storage with our spacious magnetic holder featuring a front drawer. No more cluttered workspaces. 50 Glass Head Quilting Pins Included Effortlessly secure your fabric with our set of 50 stylish glass head quilting pins. Designed for easy handling, fabric pinning becomes a breeze.
